media:group.media:title: WebGL + WebGPU  Meetup - October 2022
media:group.media:description:
Presentations: https://khr.io/zc

October's WebGLâ„¢ + WebGPU meetup was a complete success. We thank our speakers and audience for an engaging event. Audience members were treated to updates from each group and a variety of exciting speakers showcasing their latest technology. 

If you would like to be considered to present at one of our upcoming WebGL+ WebGPU Meetups, please reach out to events@khronos.org.

Agenda

00:01:01 - WebGL Updates
00:09:00 - WebGPU Updates
00:18:36 - Madcraft.io demonstration using the latest WebGL extensions
00:35:02 - Demonstration on use of WebGL in a scientific context for web molecular graphics in Mol*
01:03:09 - What's new in v2.0 and glTF
01:16:19 - Questions & Answers

Speakers: Ken Russel, Kelsey Gilbert, Ivan Popelyshev, Alexander Rose, Emmett Lalish
